channel.title: Chaotic Designs
channel.description:
Hi,
I thought I should make a intro in the graphics section as I thought it would be fitting to make a small intro then show you some of my work that I have made. I'm using Cinema4D and Photoshop to make my works and sometimes I use some other programs but not often, I'm more of a 3D Typography Designer but I have done some work in Photoshop as well so feel free to ask me any questions/tips :)
My work:
3D Typography: [img]https://cmmedia.a.ssl.fastly.net/26694888/960x288/resample(lanczos).png[/img] [img]https://cmmedia.a.ssl.fastly.net/26694891/800x400.png[/img] [img]https://cmmedia.a.ssl.fastly.net/26694878/960x288/resample(lanczos).png[/img]
Photoshop Works: [img]https://cmmedia.a.ssl.fastly.net/26694878/960x288/resample(lanczos).png[/img]
Made the Spline Logo thing in C4D^ [img]https://cmmedia.a.ssl.fastly.net/26900409/502x234.png[/img] [img]https://cmmedia.a.ssl.fastly.net/26900411/500x300.png[/img] [img]https://cmmedia.a.ssl.fastly.net/26900415/350x450.png[/img] [img]https://cmmedia.a.ssl.fastly.net/26900414/550x300.png[/img]
If you would like to see more of my work check out my portfolios: chaoticgfx.carbonmade.com or abcfgraphics.carbonmade.com

item.title: Chaotic Designs
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

It is not odd to ask for stocks used. In fact most posts have it and the work done to them so we can see if you actually did it. Nothing personal but people do just C and P finished works.

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotic Designs
item.dc:creator: @ChaoticGFX ChaoticGFX
item.description:
@ChaoticGFX wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:5, topic:550706”]highly unusual for a “designer” to not publicly share the stocks and renders he doesnt own rights to.

layers mean nothings tbh.

post the original stocks and renders or dont expect proper criticism.

as it stands, fonts are poorly positioned/colored on the signatures and the c4ds can definitely be improved with better font/lighting/color effects[/quote]

I made that piece with only that render, so don’t expect anything else from me, and so no C4D’s were used so might want to recheck mate

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotic Designs
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

The arrow and last graphic on the thread look nice but the font’s position on the guns graphic is weird looking, and a little hard to notice.

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotic Designs
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

highly unusual for a “designer” to not publicly share the stocks and renders he doesnt own rights to.

layers mean nothings tbh.

post the original stocks and renders or dont expect proper criticism.

as it stands, fonts are poorly positioned/colored on the signatures and the c4ds can definitely be improved with better font/lighting/color effects

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotic Designs
item.dc:creator: @ChaoticGFX ChaoticGFX
item.description:
@ChaoticGFX wrote:

Its strange for people to ask a designer how much effort is put into the work he shares, I personally don’t share my exact stocks and renders but I’ll give you my layers and you can decide for yourself how much effort I put into it. I was happy with the outcome considering the fact that hardly use Photoshop.

Layers for the mecha tag:
http://prntscr.com/6kga7a
http://prntscr.com/6kgaij

And the render(Credits to baka arts)
http://prntscr.com/6kgbdl

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotic Designs
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

The C4D’s aren’t too bad but they need some better lighting as well as some more textures. The bottom signatures aren’t bad but I would also like to see the stocks and renders you used so we can evaluate the amount of work put into them.

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotic Designs
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

would like to see stocks / renders of what youve used to

Read full topic
